QUEST.helpText: Don't you think Grandmaster Hartin Menz's office needs a bit of sprucing up?

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: One day, during Aesthetic Uses of Source 101...

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Now that you all are proficient in weaving carpets, let’s change things up a bit, shall we?

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: The class looks up from their work, stunned.
Some immediately look desperate to leave.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: No, it’s nothing too difficult, I assure you.
Let’s have a contest! A little competition never hurt anybody. I’ll have you all design a carpet for my office.
I don’t have much of an eye for interior design, so you people will have to do.
Whoever makes the best carpet will have the highest honour of having it displayed right there in the middle of my office, for everyone to see!
Is that really that great a prize...?

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: The class begins to murmur excitedly. Apparently, it is.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Now, if everybody's clear, let's begin!
